name: AnotherOne
description:
Battle your way through the different worlds in AnotherOne with randomized enemies, upgrades, items, relics and much more.
Roguelike action that assures you no run will ever be the same.

Battles, enemies and bosses
Within each world reside unique enemies and bosses. Learn the different mechanics and patterns of each enemy, and overcome the toughest challenges with enough skill.

Scaling system
A unique scaling system, allowing you and your foes to scale endlessly. Your skill will determine how far you can reach.
With unique items, relics and the right combinations, you'll be granted the opportunity to become stronger than ever and crush your foes in the heat of battle.

Traits
Choose your desired Trait - your main active skill - and adapt your playstyle in order to maximize your damage and survivability.

Corruption levels
Different corruption levels allow you to face stronger enemies under harder circumstances upon finishing a successful run.
